roadmap:
**Data Science Roadmap**

**Week 1: Introduction to Data Science**
*Day 1:*
1. Coursera - "What is Data Science?" [Link](https://www.coursera.org/learn/what-is-datascience)
2. edX - "Data Science Fundamentals" [Link](https://www.edx.org/course/data-science-fundamentals)
3. Khan Academy - "Introduction to Data Science" [Link](https://www.khanacademy.org/math/statistics-probability) 

*Day 2:*
1. Khan Academy - "Statistics and Probability" [Link](https://www.khanacademy.org/math/statistics-probability)
2. Udacity - "Intro to Descriptive Statistics" [Link](https://www.udacity.com/course/intro-to-descriptive-statistics--ud827)
3. YouTube - "Statistics 101" [Link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zt83ZnPp1kM)

**Week 2: Data Cleaning and Preparation**
*Day 3:*
1. Towards Data Science - "Data Cleaning in Python" [Link](https://towardsdatascience.com/data-cleaning-in-python-the-ultimate-guide-2020-c63b88bf0a0d)
2. DataCamp - "Cleaning Data in Python" [Link](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/cleaning-data-in-python)
3. Medium - "Data Cleaning Techniques" [Link](https://towardsdatascience.com/data-cleaning-techniques-d7627498e26a)

*Day 4:*
1. Tableau Public - "Data Visualization Best Practices" [Link](https://public.tableau.com/en-us/gallery)
2. Data to Viz - "How to Choose the Right Chart" [Link](https://www.data-to-viz.com/)
3. Google Developers - "Data Visualization" [Link](https://developers.google.com/chart/interactive/docs/gallery)

**Week 3: Machine Learning Basics**
*Day 5:*
1. Coursera - "Machine Learning Foundations" [Link](https://www.coursera.org/learn/machine-learning-foundations)
2. edX - "Machine Learning Fundamentals" [Link](https://www.edx.org/course/machine-learning-fundamentals)
3. Towards Data Science - "Machine Learning Basics" [Link](https://towardsdatascience.com/machine-learning-basics-9947b5af978c)
